title: Goodman Games Dungeon Crawl Classics Role Playing Game, Softcover Edition (GMG5070T)
features: Fast play, cryptic secrets, and a mysterious past await you: turn the page
Return to the Glory days of fantasy with the dungeon crawl classics role playing game.
You're an adventurer: a Reaver, a cutpurse, a heathen-slayer, a tight-lipped Warlock guarding long-dead secrets.
Package Dimensions: 27.2 L x 3.0 H x 21.2 W (centimeters)
description: Glory & gold won by sorcery & sword. You're no hero. You're an adventurer: a Reaver, a cutpurse, a heathen-slayer, a tight-lipped Warlock guarding long-dead secrets. You seek gold and glory, winning it with sword and spell, caked in the blood and filth of the weak, the dark, the demons, and the Vanquished. There are treasures to be won deep underneath, and you shall have them. Return to the Glory days of fantasy with the dungeon crawl classics role playing game. Adventure as 1974 intended you to, With modern rules grounded in the origins of sword & sorcery. Fast play, cryptic secrets, and a mysterious past await you: turn the page
